long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
TwitRep is a reputation plugin for Twitter that helps you determine who knows what in your lists.

Log in to your twitter account and wait while tweets in your lists are analyzed. Once done, you will see a reputation badge displayed on relevant profiles and tweets.

If you want to learn more about how reputation is calculated, or have other questions and concerns, you can reach us at hello@replabs.xyz
